channel.title: Server help!
channel.description:
Ok, i click runserver and its says about java not recognised or summet "/
If i right click, Edit.. What i type in the notepad for it to work?
My java is located at: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14
Thanks for the help, Jake:D

item.title: Server help!
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

Yeh by tryin to fix the problem i was messing around with it and think ive made it worse hehe…
Do you know what shud be there?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2009, 05:26:19 pm[/size][hr]Ok i re-extracted my server (Credits to Allstar)
It now says this:

@echo off
color 0a
title Allstar-Scape v1
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2009, 05:44:52 pm[/size][hr]Sorry for going on but i need to know…
Is that what its suppose to say?

My Java is located at:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14

Read full topic

item.title: Server help!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“jake_93, post:5, topic:285630”]This is for the server, not client remeber…

It says:
@echo off
Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
pause

Thanks for the help,
Jake:D[/quote]
i am pritty sure Theme.jar and Gui are not in a server

Read full topic
